thread.title: BRIEF-Cifi Holdings Group Announces Proposed Issue Of HK$2.79 Bln Zero Coupon Guaranteed Convertible Bonds Due 2019

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cifi Holdings Group Announces Proposed Issue Of HK$2.79 Bln Zero Coupon Guaranteed Convertible Bonds Due 2019

organizations.name: reuters) - cifi holdings group co ltd

text:
Jan 26 (Reuters) - Cifi Holdings Group Co Ltd:
* ANNOUNCES PROPOSED ISSUE OF HK$2.79 BILLION ZERO COUPON GUARANTEED CONVERTIBLE BONDS DUE 2019 UNDER GENERAL MANDATE​
* ‍ESTIMATED NET PROCEEDS FROM SUBSCRIPTION OF FIRM BONDS HK$2.75​ BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
